regen.absent_element: situation of adding additional roles when using a template
regen.new_specification: The user shall be able to add additional roles to the user record when the user is created from a template.

regen.absent_element: handling of additional roles when creating users
regen.new_specification: The system shall allow users to add additional roles to new users created from a template.

regen.absent_element: the ability to add additional roles to a user record after creation
regen.new_specification: The system shall allow users to add additional roles to a user record after it has been created from a template or manually.

label: The user shall be able to add additional roles manually while creating/adding a new user from a user template.
absence: action of adding additional roles when creating from a user template
